name: Renee Marie
text: Great pizzas, excellent prices! The pizzas are Always fresh, the crust is the perfect combination of crunchy and soft. The manager is friendly and welcoming. $6 for a delicious fresh large cheese pizza is the every day price! What a deal!! I would rather have Little Caesars pizza over the more expensive chains. Highly recommend!!
